attributes.action: Bring in Proportional Representation Now in the UK
attributes.additional_details: To get more in the public domain and for it to be discussed openly and fairly and the end result should be a VOTE for the whole of the uk to decide on our voting system.
attributes.background:
To change the way governments are formed which are totally unfair.
Why should a government be formed on the views of a minority and not accounting for all of the other peoples views.This needs to change soon and for all the people of the uk.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700109
